search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Hotjar (hotjar.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page URL for Hotjar is: [https://www.hotjar.com/pricing](https://www.hotjar.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

citations.title: Hotjar Pricing: Choose The Plans That Work For You

extracted_content.content:
Contentsquare Pricing: Pick the Plan That Suits Your Needs
===============
  

Are you an agency specialized in UX, digital marketing, or growth? Join our [Partner Program](https://www.hotjar.com/partners/)

Close banner

[Hotjar Logo](https://www.hotjar.com/)

[Sign in](https://insights.hotjar.com/login)

English

Language

[Get started](https://insights.hotjar.com/register?signup_source=top-cta&pricing_table=8&utm_source=hj_pricing_page_top_cta&cs_lite=1)

Toggle navigation menu

From interactions to insights, all in one place
-----------------------------------------------

User behavior, comprehensive feedback, and product analytics under one platform

### Experience Analytics

Increase engagement and conversion while eliminating friction

### Voice of Customer

Improve user happiness based on feedback and usability testing

### Product Analytics

Improve user journeys, retention, and loyalty

Start with Experience Analytics




-------------------------------------

Understand your users’ experience and learn where to make impactful changes.

Include Voice of Customer or Product Analytics when you’re ready for feedback or detailed analysis.

[Build your ideal package](https://www.hotjar.com/pricing/#all-products)

*   Up to 20k monthly sessions

    Tooltip

*   1 month of data access
    
    Tooltip
    
    Access to all session tracking data for 1 month, as well as Session Replays.
    
*   Standard filters
    
    Tooltip
    
    Filter by new vs. returning users, pages viewed, user country, and device.
    
*   Integrations for Google Analytics, etc.
    
    Tooltip
    
    Google Analytics, Mixpanel, Hubspot, and Jira.
    
*   Dashboards
    
    Tooltip
    
    Create dashboards to track your projects and goals.

*   Zone-based heatmaps

*   Impact Evaluation
    
    Tooltip

*   More than 115 integrations

Everything in pro, and:

*   Starting from 1m monthly sessions
    
*   Digital Experience Monitoring
    
    Tooltip
    
    Uncover obstacles and prioritize fixes, caused by technical issues, UX blockers and poor web and app performance.
    
    *   Error & Speed Analysis
        
        Tooltip
        
        Analyze and prioritize JS, API, Console, and Custom errors as well as speed performance issues based on business impact.

        Tooltip
        
        Get real-time alerts based on thresholds and monitor errors in a single real-time dashboard view.
        
    *   Session Replay with network detail
        
        Tooltip

*   Data feeds

*   Unlimited projects within the same business entity

*   3 months Session Replay retention

Voice of Customer

Voice of Customer


----------------------------------------

Edit plan

### Free

$0

Our Free plan includes:

*   Up to 100 monthly survey and feedback responses
    
    Tooltip
    
    Collect feedback from your users via surveys and feedback widgets. This is the amount of responses included in the plan per month.
    
*   Up to 5 monthly interviews/tests
    
    Tooltip
    
    You can get feedback directly from your users with interviews and unmoderated tests. This is the amount that is included in the plan per month for interviews, tests answered, or both. It’s a fixed amount, and it can’t be increased.
    
*   Surveys and Feedback widgets
    
    Tooltip
    
    Create 3 surveys or feedback widgets at a time. You can always delete older ones to add new widgets.
    
*   AI Survey generator and AI summary report
    
    Tooltip
    
    Create surveys for any goal in seconds with the power of AI and get an AI summary report for your survey results.
    
*   Integration to replays and segments
    
    Tooltip
    
    Make sense of feedback by replaying underlying experiences and comparing experiences that led to positive vs. poor ratings.
    
*   Surveys & Feedback integration with Jira, Slack, Hubspot, etc.
    
    Tooltip
    
    For example, Slack, Microsoft Teams, Zapier, HubSpot, Trello, Asana, etc.
    

### Growth

Most popular

$99

Billed annuallyDiscounts applied

Everything in Free, and:

*   Starting from 500 monthly responses
    
    Tooltip
    
    Collect feedback from your users via surveys and feedback widgets. You choose the amount of responses included in your plan per month.
    
*   Up to 10 monthly interviews/tests
    
    Tooltip
    
    You can get feedback directly from your users with interviews and unmoderated tests. This is the amount that is included in the plan per month for interviews, tests answered, or both. It’s a fixed amount, and it can’t be increased.
    
*   Advanced targeting and filtering
    
    Tooltip
    
    Set survey & feedback widgets to reach specific audiences matching specific user attributes, like high-value customers or specific roles.
    
*   AI-automated survey analysis
    
    Tooltip
    
    Automatically categorize open-text survey responses as positive, neutral, and negative and track sentiment over time. Identify the main topics people talk about with automated tags.
    
*   Customize colors, logo and branding
    
    Tooltip
    
    Make it your own: add your logo, change the colors, and remove Contentsquare's branding.
    
*   20+ Surveys & Feedback integrations
    
    Tooltip
    
    For example, Slack, Microsoft Teams, Zapier, HubSpot, Segment, Mixpanel, Unbounce, Optimizely, Google Analytics, Trello, and Omniconvert.
    

### Pro

Let's talk

Everything in growth, and:

*   Starting from 500 monthly responses
    
    Tooltip
    
    Collect feedback from your users via surveys and feedback widgets. You choose the amount of responses included in your plan per month.
    
*   Up to 300 monthly interviews/tests
    
    Tooltip
    
    You can get feedback directly from your users with interviews and unmoderated tests. You choose the amount of interviews, tests answered that you would like on your plan, or both.
    
*   Panel recruitment for interviews and user tests
    
    Tooltip
    
    Recruit interviewees from Contentsquare pool of 200,000+ participants.
    
*   API, export survey responses and more
    
    Tooltip
    
    Automatically export survey responses and automate user lookup and deletion requests.
    
*   Max interview length: 120 mins
    
    Tooltip
    
    Ideal for in-depth interviews and prototype testing.
    
*   Up to 4 additional interview moderators and 10 spectators
    
    Tooltip
    
    Invite up to 4 team members per interview to join you as extra moderators and up to 10 team members to quietly observe and assist with note-taking and highlighting insights.
    

Product Analytics

Product Analytics


----------------------------------------

Edit plan

### Free

Let's talk

Our Free plan includes:

*   Up to 10k monthly sessions
    
*   Core analytics charts
    
    Tooltip
    
    Use charts to monitor most important KPIs and track data over time
    
*   Dashboards
    
    Tooltip
    
    Start with templated dashboards tailored to your role or industry and customize based on your unique business needs
    
*   Unlimited enrichment sources
    
    Tooltip
    
    Enrich user profiles with data from your apps
    
*   6 months data history
    

### Growth

Let's talk

Everything in Free, and:

*   Starting from 17k monthly sessions
    
*   AI Co-Pilot
    
    Tooltip
    
    CoPilot makes it easy for anyone to get started with analytics, no matter their experience. Skip the learning curve and lengthy onboarding—and go straight to insights.
    
*   Unlimited users & reports
    
*   Chart customization
    
    Tooltip
    
    Customize colors, change the names of axes, create custom labels, and more.
    
*   12 months data history
    

### Pro

Most popular

Let's talk

Everything in growth, and:

*   Starting from 33k monthly sessions
    
*   Account analytics
    
    Tooltip
    
    Measure KPIs at the account level. B2B companies can use this to track churn and account health.
    
*   Engagement matrix
    
    Tooltip
    
    Quickly measure feature success without creating multiple complex charts and dashboards
    
*   Report alerts
    
    Tooltip
    
    Get immediate notifications when key chart or funnel metrics change
    
*   Optional add-ons
    
    Tooltip
    
    Add options for syncing data to your Data Warehouse — automatically and retroactively, and integrating data with customer engagement tools for personalized communication
    

### Enterprise

Let's talk

Everything in pro, and:

*   Starting from 1m monthly sessions
    
*   Data warehouse integration
    
    Tooltip
    
    Sync data to your Data Warehouse — automatically and retroactively
    
*   Behavioral targeting
    
    Tooltip
    
    Integrate data with customer engagement tools for personalized communication
    
*   Unlimited projects\*
    
    Tooltip
    
    Manage unlimited separate analytics environments for multiple apps and websites each, within the same geo region of your company.
    
*   Advanced user permissions
    
    Tooltip
    
    Create custom roles, rename existing roles, and delete unused roles. Capture audit logs of user activities, and more.
    

Product Analytics will be a separate application for the next few months while we work to have all products under one platform.

Filter and segment data
-----------------------

Filter and segment data

Tooltip

Ask and answer smarter questions by narrowing down which sessions you analyze.

Standard

Advanced

Retroactive, precision filtering

Retroactive, precision filtering

Filter by new vs. returning users

Tooltip

Examine how first time visitors engage with your channel differently than users that are already familiar with it.

Filter by pages viewed, country, devices

Tooltip

Filter by pages viewed, country, and device to distinguish differing experiences and high level goals.

Filter by session and device profile

Tooltip

Filter and segment data by duration, browser version and language, operation system, and more to find actionable insights quicker.

Filter by User ID and attributes

Tooltip

Find specific sessions based on a user ID and attributes.

Filter by frustration behaviors

Tooltip

Zoom into sessions that experienced rage clicks and other frustrations.

Filter by in-page behaviors

Tooltip

Filter users based on their clicks and hover-based behaviors within pages to zero in on behaviors that lead to success vs. abandonment.

Filter by sequential behaviors

Tooltip

Troubleshoot certain behaviors and issues with the ability to create segments that performed page views or actions in specific sequences.

Filter by custom variables

Tooltip

Examine sessions based on custom variable criteria, e.g. the type of a car engine selected on an automotive website or app.

Filter by errors and speed performance

Tooltip

Troubleshoot sessions where users experienced errors or slow vs. fast performance.

and many more criteria

Tooltip

The better you can refine your questions, the better Contentsquare can provide insights.

Enable authorized team members to see a deeper view of sessions to faster resolve advanced support requests and escalations.

Most common questions
---------------------

### What are sessions?

A session is a visitor’s full journey on your site (or app, if applicable), including every page or screen they visit. Every time a visitor comes to your site or app, we’ll capture their journey and how they interact with your page. Sessions can be analyzed on heatmaps, funnels, replays, charts, dashboards, and more. Sessions end after 30 minutes of inactivity.

### How many sessions do I need?

Select a plan that allows you to **capture every session on your site**. Compare to your existing analytics to estimate the number of sessions needed. Otherwise, once you reach the monthly sessions purchased on our Growth plans, you won’t be able to get more session data before the next month.

### What are replays?

Session Replay reconstructs an individual visitor session on your site or app. It allows you to watch how users interact with your content, such as where they click, hover, swipe, and see potential issues.

### Can I have multiple sites within one account?

Yes, you can. You can have as many sites as you need under one account. Please note that the plan you choose, including sessions and responses, will be available for all the sites. For the Free or Growth plans, these sessions and responses will be divided equally between sites. For example, if you select 10k sessions and you have 2 sites, each site will get 5k sessions. You should choose a number of sessions and/or responses that work for all your sites.

Please note that for Pro and Enterprise, this does not apply.

### Can I have a trial?

Yes, every new account starts with a **free trial** of our Growth plans. There are no auto-charges, and you don't need to input any payment details. After the 15-day trial period, you can choose which plans you want (or continue with the free ones).

### What happens if I reach the session or response limit?

Each plan comes with a pre-defined number of sessions or responses that automatically resets each month.

If you reach the session limit on our Free and Growth plans:

*   You won't get any new heatmap or funnel data until next month's reset date.
    

If you reach the response limit for Voice of the Customer:

*   Your surveys and widgets will no longer be sent, so you won’t be getting new responses until next month’s reset date.
    

To avoid lost data, you can upgrade by adding more sessions or responses or even to a new plan (with more and new features!).

Billing questions
-----------------

### What currencies does Contentsquare accept?

Contentsquare's Growth plans for European customers will be billed in Euros (applicable to the European continent; for example, the UK is billed in Euros), while customers outside of this region will be billed in US dollars.

### What's the commitment?

Our growth plans do not require an annual contract. If you choose to pay monthly, you can cancel your subscription at any time by downgrading to the free Basic plan.

If you choose to downgrade, the new plan will only become effective after the end of the current monthly subscription.

### Are the prices per site?

No, the prices are for your entire account within one geographic region (e.g., North America vs. Europe, etc.), no matter how many sites you have under the same account. So, any plan you choose (including sessions and responses) will be applied to all your sites within the region. We recommend you select a plan and number of sessions and responses that cover your needs.

### Do you offer yearly price plans? Or bundle discounts?

Yes to both. You can pay for your plans annually. When annual payment is set up in-app with a credit card or PayPal, a 20% discount before VAT is added to your bill. Note that this discount is not applicable when paying by invoice.

Also, we offer a 10% discount on the lowest selected plan when you subscribe to two paid, Growth tier plans (i.e. a paid plan on our Digital Experience Analytics Growth product, and a paid plan on our Voice of Customer Growth product). This applies on top of the 20% discount on annual plans.

### How do the yearly and package discounts work?

We offer two discount types when paying for our Growth tier plans in-app using a credit card or PayPal:

*   A 20% discount when you pay for your subscription yearly.
    

*   A 10% discount on the lowest plan when you subscribe to two Growth tier plans (e.g. a paid plan on our Experience Analytics product, and a paid plan on our Voice of Customer product)
    

Please note that these discounts are only applicable to in-app payments. Payments made through a manual invoice are not eligible for either discount.

### What payment methods do you support?

For monthly or yearly payments, we support all major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, AMEX, Maestro, and Discover) and PayPal.

### What’s the cancellation policy?

All new Growth plan accounts have a 30-day-money-back guarantee. Cancel within 30 days and you’ll receive a full refund.

If you cancel a Growth plan after 30 days you’ll be charged up until the end of the current billing cycle. For customers on a monthly contract, that will be a month after your last payment. For customers on an annual contract, that will be a year after your last payment.

Remember, you never need to delete your account completely. You can cancel the Growth plan subscription but continue to have access to our Free plan. You’ll simply move down to our forever Free plan.
